title: Title
chromeBookmarksNotAvailable: Chrome Bookmarks API is not available
loginToMarkhub: This extension works with the Markhub app. Please visit markhub.app to register an account first, then login here to enable sync functionality
configureAiService: Configure AI service for intelligent folder recommendation
testCurrentConfig: Test if the current AI service configuration can connect and respond normally
autoSyncDescription: Automatically sync Chrome bookmarks to Markhub app
autoMoveDescription: Automatically move bookmarks after AI folder recommendation
notificationsDescription: Show sync and recommendation related notifications
initialSyncDescription: Sync your existing Chrome bookmarks and folder structure to Markhub. If bookmarks with the same URL already exist in Markhub, they will be overwritten.
loginAndEnableSyncFirst: Please login and enable sync functionality first
pleaseLoginFirst: Please login and enable sync functionality first
initialSyncCompleted: Initial sync completed! Created {{folders}} folders and {{bookmarks}} bookmarks
initialSyncFailed: Initial sync failed, please check detailed error information
fillCompleteAiConfig: Please fill in complete AI service configuration
aiClassifyingMessage: Finding the best folder for your bookmark
aiRecommendationFailedMessage: Unable to get folder recommendation, please try again later
autoAgreeIn5Seconds: Will automatically agree to recommendation in 5 seconds
aiConfigErrorApiKey: AI service configuration error: API Key cannot be empty
aiConfigErrorApiUrl: AI service configuration error: API URL cannot be empty
aiConfigErrorModelName: AI service configuration error: Model name cannot be empty
aiConfigErrorInvalidUrl: AI service configuration error: Invalid API URL format
aiServiceUnavailableGeneric: AI service temporarily unavailable, recommend to general folder
aiServiceUnavailableDefault: AI service temporarily unavailable, recommend to default folder
loginStatusLoggedIn: You are successfully logged into your Markhub account
loginStatusNotLoggedIn: Login to your Markhub account to enable sync functionality
loginBenefit1: • Auto sync Chrome bookmarks to cloud
withoutLoginFeature2: • AI folder recommendations (requires AI service configuration)
registerAtMarkhub: Don't have an account? Visit markhub.app to register
loginStatusNotLoggedInDetailed: Login to your Markhub account to enable sync functionality
loginErrorInvalidCredentials: Login failed: Invalid username or password
loginErrorNetworkError: Login failed: Network connection error, please check your network settings
loginErrorServerError: Login failed: Server error, please try again later
loginErrorConnectionRefused: Login failed: Cannot connect to server, please check server address configuration
